scripts.postinstall: typings install && git submodule init && git submodule update && cd node_modules/susa && npm install --silent && npm run initialize --silent
scripts.build-nanoshooter: npm run clean --silent && tsc && tslint src/**/*.ts && echo Nanoshooter build complete.
scripts.build: npm run build-susa && npm run build-nanoshooter
scripts.test: echo No tests yet, lol && exit 0
